divs: sighting detailshi, my name is [name removed\cms\tg], i am a church pastor, scholar, historian, and practicing ufologist. i have a video (vhs) of a ufo sighting (it's a very compelling & authentic video of a live ufo hovering over my house at night!) that i witnessed & recorded back in 1996. i think that this video would interest you, and your colleagues, very much! i have been sitting on this, looking for someone to show it to, for quite some time, i hope you are the guys who want to see this evidence first hand!! i would appreciate you contacting me soon..
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in North Augusta
There were no other sightings in North Augusta on or around December 15th 1996
